result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Paid interpreter fees for services on 7/12/22 to Enrique Soria, batch 7746.

2:27 PM Defendant Adonis J Alvarez not in court.  Attorney Jason Carlos Gonzalez in court for Adonis J Alvarez.  Attorney Rebekah Rennicke for Robin W Lee in court for State of Wisconsin.  Body only BW previously issued for DCPS to remain.
Per DCPS violation report, Court orders body-only bench warrant.
DCPS Violation Report; Court Response: issue body-only bench warrant

Jason Gonzalez appointed 6-23-2022

10:21 AM Defendant in court, in custody.  Hector Al-Homsi appeared for the State of Wisconsin. SPD appointing counsel, CT sets another STC.  Status conference scheduled for July 12, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

and returned.
5-24-22 minutes and bond forms emailed to DCJ

SIGNATURE BOND SET - $500 PER CASE - REFERRAL TO DCPTS
  You may be responsible for paying the amount of your signature bond if you miss a court date or do not follow conditions of your release.
The Court ordered a signature bond on the condition that the defendant reports to and complies with Pretrial Services. The defendant shall report by  5/24/22 immediately following release.
The following checked category(s) are also ordered: __ GPS, _X_ Remote Breath (Alcohol) Monitoring, and/or __ Random Drug Testing. 
NONCOMPLIANCE WILL BE REPORTED BY DCPS TO THE JUDICIARY WHO SHALL RESPOND IN ONE OF THESE WAYS: Schedule bail hearing, Increase Supervision, Issue warrant, No change but monitor.
- Defendant shall not operate a motor vehicle. 
- Defendant shall not consume or possess alcohol. 
Parties did not stipulate to waive the time limits for Preliminary Hearing. 
Trial Judge - Br 7
referral to PTS
Status conference on June 23, 2022 at 10:30 am.

IN CUSTODY

10:18 AM Defendant Adonis J Alvarez in court. Prosecuting Atty Frank J. Remington appeared for State of Wisconsin. Interpreter JL, duly sworn.  DE does not qualify for SPD.  CT: amending to $500 signature bond, to report to PTS today, with remote breath testing as a condition. All other conditions remain the same. 

CT finds good cause to set over, DE needs to apply at CDP after reporting for PTS.  Status conference scheduled for June 23, 2022 at 10:30 am.
for setover of 5-24-22 prelim; ADA Lee
Zoom
Preliminary hearing on May 24, 2022 at 10:00 am.

- Defendant shall not operate a motor vehicle. 
- Defendant shall not consume or possess alcohol. 
Parties did not stipulate to waive the time limits for Preliminary Hearing. 
Trial Judge - Br 7

02:34 PM Defendant in court, in custody with Attorney Luis C Cuevas.  Lillian Rose Nelson appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Fayme Filipiak duly sworn & interpreted. All parties by Zoom. The defendant was advised regarding their right to an attorney and to the SPD application process if not already represented. Defendant received a copy of the Complaint and waived reading. Court entered Not Guilty pleas as to any misdemeanor counts.  The defendant will need an interpreter for future court appearances.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 24, 2022 at 10:00 am.
